snippet: The activist investor Nelson Peltz plans to begin a campaign against the French food maker Danone, having acquired a 1 percent stake in the company, according to a person briefed on the matter.
abstract: The activist investor Nelson Peltz plans to begin a campaign against the French food maker Danone, having acquired a 1 percent stake in the company, according to a person briefed on the matter.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Peltz Said to Take Stake in Danone
